description: This is a requirement for the diosposal of expired supplies and the delivery of new emer-genoy supplies.
full_summary:
# Emergency Supplies for Fraser Valley and Interior Tax Services Office

## Description

The Government of Canada, through the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA), is seeking proposals for the supply and delivery of emergency food, water, and survival modules for the Fraser Valley and Interior Tax Services Office (FVITSO). The FVITSO is located in the Pacific Region along a major fault line, posing a high risk of earthquakes. This tender is to ensure sufficient emergency supplies are available in case of a disaster.

## Bid Requirements

The successful bidder will be responsible for:

* Removing and disposing of expired emergency supplies (Modules, First Aid Kits, Water Rations)
* Supplying and delivering new emergency food and water module for installation in designated emergency cabinets.

## Evaluation Criteria

* Mandatory Criteria: Technical evaluation of bidder's qualifications and ability to meet the tender requirements
* Financial Proposals: Evaluation of cost and pricing to determine the lowest price
* Basis of Selection: Respondent Bidder must comply with the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive

## Tender Submission

To submit a bid for this tender, please use the Canada Post Corporation's Connect service through [https://www.canadapost-postescanada.ca/cpc/en/business/postal-services/digital-mail/connect.page](link).

## Contracting Authority

All inquiries regarding this tender should be directed to:

* Katherine Hutton, Contracting Officer
* Email: [katherine.hutton@cra-arc.gc.ca](mailto:katherine.hutton@cra-arc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 286-5340

## Notice URL

For more information and to download the draft tender documents, please visit: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4362/rfp-1000440874---emergency-supplies-for-fvitso.pdf

## Tender Closing Date

Bids must be received by April 4th, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EST.
